document.full_text: at least 165 people have been killed in the past week in fighting between south sudan's army and militia, the army said monday, part of a wave of violence in the territory ahead of its independence in july.
document.title: south sudan clashes kill 165 in a week: army
lines_and_colors: at least 165 people have been killed in the past week in fighting between south sudan's army and militia, the army said monday, part of a wave of violence in the territory ahead of its independence in july.
